11.content: In ashdeen ridge there is always strange things going on today is no different Tyler has been cleaning out the attic and has found an old stone with a craving in it he takes it down to his room and examines it it ends up having magical powers and shrinks him as this happens someone walk in the room .......
11.title: Tyler shrinks in the house

14.content:
One day it happened Harry didn’t know when or how it started but he developed a foot fetish.

He started to notice how nice his friends the twins billie and tonie’s feet were and how he’d like to touch them, smell them and maybe even kiss them.

After awhile he decided to tell the twins who were in their room about his love of their feet....
14.title: Harry worships the twins feet
